name: Pride of Cassius
flavorText: He moved swiftly and he struck hard. Truly the greatest warrior to have walked the land.
flavorTextHtml: He moved swiftly and he struck hard. Truly the greatest warrior to have walked the land.

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

secondary.textHtml: Increases the duration of Ignore Pain by 5 seconds. (Barbarian Only) [4 - 6]
